title: The manuscripts of His Grace the Duke of Portland, preserved at Welbeck abbey ...
snippet: Thence by Lochan, Sir John Warender's, Belton water mill, Mr. David Hay's : near which is a pretty good "Change-house," as they call their inns and public houses here, but we had no occasion or temptation to stop at it ; near Teningham, Lord Haddington's, on the right, over Lentoun brigg cross a large stream running in a rocky bed, leaving Prestonhaugh  Kirk to the right.
